content.raw: Couldn't we just enable the GUI move/rotate tools for individual links? We are now able to select links by clicking twice on a link. Also, publishing to the `~/model/modify` topic can set link poses (see [PhysicsMsgsTest::LinkPose](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/0e2207f8d14992552786558471494e5bc20569bb/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc?at=default#cl-305)). It seems like it would be straightforward to adjust the `ModelManipulator` to act on a link if it is selected. What do you think @chapulina and @iche033 ?
